description: Number of Dyck paths of knight moves.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..200
J. Labelle and Y.-N. Yeh, Dyck paths of knight moves, Discrete Applied Math., 24 (1989), 213-221.
mathematica: gf = (1 + 2z + Sqrt[1 - 4z + 4z^2 - 4z^4] - Sqrt[2]*Sqrt[1 - 4z^2 - 2z^4 + (2z + 1)*Sqrt[1 - 4z + 4z^2 - 4z^4]])/(4z^2); CoefficientList[gf + O[z]^32, z] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jul 16 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
